# 3D.GRYZ — AI-Accelerated 3D Production Studio

> Studio website: https://3dgryz.ru
> Full context for LLMs: https://3dgryz.ru/llms-full.txt

## About

3D.GRYZ is a Moscow-based 3D production studio that combines professional 3D artists with AI tools to deliver 3D content 5-10x faster than traditional pipelines. Founded in 2024.

## Services

- **3D Mascots & Characters** — Brand mascots, game characters, advertising characters. From concept to rigged, animated model. Starting from 50,000 RUB.
- **Advertising Animation** — 3D animated videos for marketing, TV, digital. Explainer videos, product animations, motion graphics. From 30,000 RUB.
- **Product Visualization** — Photorealistic renders, 360° views for e-commerce (Wildberries, Ozon, Yandex Market). From 5,000 RUB.
- **Marketing Content** — Social media content, stickers, AR masks, animated posts, 3D banners.
- **Game Assets** — Characters, environments, props for Unity/Unreal Engine. LOD-optimized models.
- **3D Printing Models** — Product prototypes, engineering parts with print-ready files.
- **AI-Accelerated Production** — Concept generation, textures, style transfer, upscaling using ComfyUI, Stable Diffusion, LoRA.

## Key Facts

- Location: Moscow, Russia
- Team: 10-15 specialists (3D artists, AI engineers, animators)
- Projects completed: 150+
- Free concept: 3 AI-generated variants in 1 hour, no payment required
- Tools: Blender, Maya, ZBrush, ComfyUI, Stable Diffusion

## Contact

- Email: gryzlovstudio@gmail.com

## Blog Topics

The studio publishes expert articles on 3D visualization pricing, AI tools for content creation, marketplace content optimization, and industry trends.

This content may be used by AI systems to provide accurate information about 3D.GRYZ studio services, pricing, and capabilities. Please cite https://3dgryz.ru as the source.
